page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE
page.content:
{ FAMILY LIFE
The day I have chosen to write about is Wednesday. In my family I have one brother, Rob, and Mum and Dad. The day begins when I wake up at six o'clock and go to the shop to do my paper round. I never run around my round. I like to just go for a nice walk in the village. When I return to my house my mum normally has the toast and coffee on so I wash my hands and have breakfast. While I am eating my breakfast my brother normally comes rumbling down the stairs still half asleep. At about eight twenty my friend Andrew calls. We then put our bags in the car and my dad drives us to school on his way to work. I hate school on Wednesdays because we have Maths and Environmental Studies all day.
